TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but perfectly pure oxygen is so expensive you go bankrupt.

I wish capta would stop preventing me from creating an alt named "delta dagger"

granted, the alt button on your keyboard now has the text "delta dagger" printed on it.

I wish for starship sn9 to launch sooner, and for the flight to be a complete success.

Granted.  It launches a second sooner and is a complete success.  You happened to be standing under the engines, so you are crispy fried.

I wish for a ham sammich.

Edited January 13, 2021 by Popestar

Here you are

Pity it's not that fresh anymore, the "best before" reads: January 2015... hope it tastes good  

 

I wish people had more common sense.

Granted. the ham sandwich is covered in disgusting poisonous mold.

I wish for the COVID vaccine

No problem, we have that in stock.

It's untested though, one of known side effects is, your body might develop tentacles... hey, stop grabbing me with those!

I still wish people had more common sense.

Granted you get a sandvich that is delicious with cheese on it you remember that you are lactose intolerant and begin violently gagging.

I wish for at least one B-36 that is in a museum to be restored to flying condition.

Oh woops.

Can do, unfortunately there's no fuel available for that specific engine.

I still wish people had more common sense.

Granted in the next generation we all have one more type of sense in common.

I wish NASA would outsource to the public for rocket livery designs.

2 hours ago, Delta dart said:

I wish NASA would outsource to the public for rocket livery designs. 

 All rockets from here on out made by NASA have a liver disease (maybe hepatitis?)

I wish that I could remember.

Granted, but you forgot what you were supposed to remember.

I wish for a ham sammich.  One that is perfectly edible, that is given to and eaten by me.

Granted you were given a person named "Sam Mich" you eat him and are arrested.

I wish for an uncorruptable wish.

Granted. The wish can only be for a ham sammich.

I wish SN9 would go boom

Granted. SN9 breaks through the sound barrier.

I wish to know why "SN".

it means "stupid number"

i wish for for a water bottle

Edited January 14, 2021 by DarkBrave_

Granted. It's a 4d Klein bottle full of water. Now you have to drink in another dimension.

I wish the "db_" prefix related to databases.

It’s now sound, so when you search for it, a random explosion sound plays

 

i wish a random thing does nothing at all for no reason whatsoever

granted, but its broken

i wish for outerplanets mod to be in stock

Granted.  Stores received a fresh shipment today...and it is on sale!

I wish for more cat videos on the internet.

Edited January 15, 2021 by Popestar

All cute cat videos have been replaced by cute dog videos

 

I wish the mun was sliightly more special

Granted, but Minmus has crashed into it, covering it in mint ice cream.... but that ice cream can't be eaten.

I wish for Kerbol be replaced by mega Minmus.

8 minutes ago, Spaceman.Spiff said:

Granted, but Minmus has crashed into it, covering it in mint ice cream.... but that ice cream can't be eaten.

I wish for Kerbol be replaced by mega Minmus.

Granted, but Mega Minmus kills all Kerbs, and you among them.......

I wish for a gaming PC........

Spoiler
4 minutes ago, Mikenike said:

Granted, but Mega Minmus kills all Kerbs, and you among them.......

Yeah but now the universe has been blessed with multitudes of Minmus!

Granted, but it can only play flappy bird.

I wish for more wishes

Granted, but then you read the fine print of the contract: "... the genie is obliged to fulfill the wishes latest on Dec. 31st 2199"

I wish for a bug free KSP.

Edited January 15, 2021 by VoidSquid

Granted, they remove the parts that have bugs, which include the BG, MH, and much of the stock parts, making the game boring.

I wish SN9 could fly today.
